name: Infrajs
body:
## Requirements
- [Docker](https://docs.docker.com/engine/installation/)

## Dependencies
```bash
npm install
```

## Run gulp tasks
```bash
gulp
```

## Run electron app
```bash
# Local
./node_modules/.bin/electron .

# Global
electron .
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
